article: Crabs are very interesting creatures. If you put several of them in a bucket, the moment one of them starts crawling out, the other crabs will pull him back down. So none of the crabs ever  _  in getting out. They just keep stopping each other from climbing higher than the rest of them. We humans are  _  more like crabs than we think. We try to get even with our enemies, and ahead of our  _  . But we have to realize that "when we're green with envy( ) , we're also ripe for problems". Whether we admit it or not, most of us want other people to be just a little less successful than we are. Friends are always  _  about your success, as long as you're not more successful than they are ! But one of the first secrets to success is not to compare your life with others. It's strange that many of us seem to know  _  to live everybody else's lives but our own. Even though what happens in someone else's life has  _  to do with ours. Successful people look at life through a telescope and see how great it can be,  _  jealous people look at life through a microscope and only see the faults and mistakes of others. Being jealous of others is just a slow way of suicide that will  _  both your health and happiness. You have a special  _  and personality that no one else has. So use yours the best way possible. Stop comparing yourself with others. Birds don't  _  . Pigs don't climb trees. And crabs don't fly. Enjoy your own natural abilities and develop your own style.
